EmailTemplate.description: Email to partner who've RSVP'd to our VIP Networking Event
EmailTemplate.name: 18-02 SP NE RSVP Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: We'll See You Monday at our VIP Networking Event!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View this email in your browser
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank You for RSVP'ing to BlueWave's VIP Networking Event!
We look forward to connecting with you during our VIP Networking Event, following the Solar Power Northeast Conference! As a reminder, the event is:
Monday, February 5th, 2018 from 6PM-7:30PM at The Social Register at the Aloft Hotel 401 D St., Boston, MA 02210
We look forward to seeing you there!
-All of us here at BlueWave
